scripts.cypress:run: cypress run --spec ./cypress/integration/**/*.spec.ts --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=./reporter_config.json; mochawesome-merge --reportDir ../../../../target/kibana-siem/cypress/results > ../../../../target/kibana-siem/cypress/results/output.json; marge ../../../../target/kibana-siem/cypress/results/output.json --reportDir ../../../../target/kibana-siem/cypress/results; mkdir -p ../../../../target/junit && cp ../../../../target/kibana-siem/cypress/results/*.xml ../../../../target/junit/
